questions: Can you elaborate on your experience with Microsoft SQL Server and how you have utilized Transact-SQL in your professional software development projects?
How have you contributed to enhancing the performance of SQL Server databases by creating and updating Clustered and Non-Clustered Indexes?
Could you provide examples of how you have implemented business logic using Triggers, Indexes, Views, and Stored Procedures in your previous projects?
In what ways have you optimized queries by creating various clustered and non-clustered indexes and indexed views in SQL Server?
Can you discuss your experience with authoring and deploying SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) packages, and how you have used them in your projects?

How have you applied your knowledge of relational database models, including constructing Procedures, Triggers, Tables, Table variables, user-defined functions, and views, in your software development work?
What methodologies have you used for analyzing and understanding business requirements in projects, and how have you implemented ETL and business logic with various tasks and transformations?
How have you been involved in unit testing against developed packages and ensuring security and roles in SQL Server environments?
Can you provide examples of how you have written migration queries for data migration and report purposes, and how you have developed dynamic SQL queries with manipulated data?
How have you collaborated with development and QA teams in coordinating development activities and enhancing existing code according to client requirements in your previous role as a SQL Developer?
